title: 'Not recommended'
body: It's a fine tip alright and the colour fasteners is great too. However eyeliner need to have a bendable bristle for smooth application. Imagine using a sketch pen to line your eyes. Eyelids have creases and wrinkles and they are nothing like solid papers. So the tip of this liner is a complete bust. Do NOT BUY

title: 'So easy to use!'
body: Sometimes getting a steady hand for lining your eyes is so difficult and this liner is so handy here. It's just like using a pen! The thickness of the line is perfect for getting a fine finish. Use a double stroke for a thicker finish.
